Package googol.gateway

Class Gateway

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
googol.gateway.Gateway
All Implemented Interfaces:
IGateway, Serializable, Remote
public class Gateway extends UnicastRemoteObject implements IGateway
Represents the main server component implementing the IGateway interface. Acts as a central hub for communication with connected clients and barrels
See Also:

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Main method the program server, finds the current IP of the machine, creates a new server object and binds it to the RMI registry while constantly checking if the barrels are still alive in a parallel thread
      Parameters:
      args - Command-line arguments
